attributes.action: sack Mick Martin from his post as Mr Speaker, forthwith, following his attempt, yesterday, to stifle discussion about the fiddling going on with MPs taxpayer funded tax-free allowances and expenses in the House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
